mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet (user_id, room_id, pet_id, pet_name, species, breed, gender, birth_date, weight, avatar_url, health_status, create_time, update_time) VALUE (#{userId}, #{roomId}, #{petId}, #{petName}, #{species}, #{breed}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{weight}, #{avatarUrl}, #{healthStatus}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
